steps.title: Roster List
steps.content: Take a tour to get familiar with this page. You may also access this tour anytime from this Help.

steps.title: Sorting and Filtering
steps.content:
Sorting: Click on table headers to sort the columns. Sorting can be combined.

Filtering: Click on the filter icons to filter columns.

steps.title: Profile and Emails
steps.content:
Select one member to view his/her profile.

Select one or multiple member(s) to send email(s).
